001package imagingbook.lib.filter.linear;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterScalarSeparable;
004import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
005
006public class LinearFilterSeparable extends GenericFilterScalarSeparable {
007
008        private final float[] hX, hY;                   // the horizontal/vertical kernel arrays
009        private final int width, height;                // width/height of the kernel
010        private final int xc, yc;                               // 'hot spot' coordinates
011        
012        public LinearFilterSeparable(Kernel1D kernelXY) {
013                this(kernelXY, kernelXY);
014        }
015        
016        public LinearFilterSeparable(Kernel1D kernelX, Kernel1D kernelY) {
017                super();
018                this.hX = kernelX.getH();
019                this.hY = kernelY.getH();
020                this.width = kernelX.getWidth();
021                this.height = kernelY.getWidth();
022                this.xc = kernelX.getXc();
023                this.yc = kernelY.getXc();
024        }
025
026        // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
027
028        // 1D convolution in x-direction
029        @Override
030        protected float doPixelX(PixelSlice source, int u, int v) {
031                final int vj = v; // - yc;
032                double sum = 0;
033                for (int i = 0; i < width; i++) {
034                        int ui = u + i - xc;
035                        sum = sum + source.getVal(ui, vj) * hX[i];
036                }
037                return (float)sum;
038        }
039        
040        @Override
041        // 1D convolution in y-direction
042        protected float doPixelY(PixelSlice source, int u, int v) {
043                final int ui = u; // - xc;
044                double sum = 0;
045                for (int j = 0; j < height; j++) {
046                        int vj = v + j - yc;
047                        sum = sum + source.getVal(ui, vj) * hY[j];
048                }
049                return (float) sum;
050        }
051
052}
